person.persName: James A. Boyd (Christian County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker, farmer, and postmaster)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker, farmer, and postmaster. North Carolina native. Married to Susan H. Brodie Boyd. Father of Mary A. Boyd, Rebecca D. Boyd, J. A. Boyd, and Hattie L. Boyd. Cabinetmaker in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860. Farmer in Christian County in 1863. Postmaster in Christian County from April 24, 1865 to January 19, 1866.
